name: Jump'n
description:
Welcome to Jump'n where the level never stops and all you can do is jump.

You can jump pretty high so don't feel too daunted by the tall cliffs.

The level goes forever and is randomly generated so it will never be the same twice.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam by three awesome developers.

Sean Brown - Programming

Avery Mitchell - Music & Sound

Jon Navidson - Art
